mapper.select: select id, project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, simple_class_name, min_line_number, max_line_number, full_method from lv_invoke_method_line_number where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into lv_invoke_method_line_number(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, simple_class_name, min_line_number, max_line_number, full_method) values (#{projectId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{methodHash}, #{simpleClassName}, #{minLineNumber}, #{maxLineNumber}, #{fullMethod})

insert into lv_invoke_method_line_number(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, simple_class_name, min_line_number, max_line_number, full_method) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.methodHash}, #{entity.simpleClassName}, #{entity.minLineNumber}, #{entity.maxLineNumber}, #{entity.fullMethod})

insert into lv_invoke_method_line_number(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, simple_class_name, min_line_number, max_line_number, full_method) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.methodHash}, #{entity.simpleClassName}, #{entity.minLineNumber}, #{entity.maxLineNumber}, #{entity.fullMethod})
on duplicate key update project_id = values(project_id), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), method_hash = values(method_hash), simple_class_name = values(simple_class_name), min_line_number = values(min_line_number), max_line_number = values(max_line_number), full_method = values(full_method)
mapper.update:
update lv_invoke_method_line_number
project_id = #{projectId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
method_hash = #{methodHash},
simple_class_name = #{simpleClassName},
min_line_number = #{minLineNumber},
max_line_number = #{maxLineNumber},
full_method = #{fullMethod},
where id = #{id}
